name: LinkOS
description:
Entry for GMTK Jam 2021

Theme: Joined Together

You are the system of a connected chamber and your task is to move the robot (circle) to the exit (triangle). You can toggle doors to open good paths, or close bad ones. 

However, you can't spend much energy, so you must think about each move.

Credits

Game Developer: Eduardo Rodrigues

Music and Sounds: Kaphes

Cover Art: Kauê Watanabe
